description: The parameters for generating a port-outs CSV report.

filters.description: The filters to apply to the export port-out CSV report.

status__in.description: The status of the port-outs to include in the report.

customer_reference__in.description: The customer reference of the port-outs to include in the report.

end_user_name.description: The end user name of the port-outs to include in the report.

phone_numbers__overlaps.description: A list of phone numbers that the port-outs phone numbers must overlap with.

created_at__lt.description: The date and time the port-out was created before.

created_at__gt.description: The date and time the port-out was created after.
